verses.verse: וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> become בְּיוֹם֩ <WH3117> And it came to pass on the day כַּלּ֨וֹת <WH3615> had fully מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> that Moses לְהָקִ֣ים <WH6965> set up אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֗ן <WH4908> the tabernacle וַיִּמְשַׁ֨ח <WH4886> and had anointed אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> וַיְקַדֵּ֤שׁ <WH6942> it and sanctified אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כֵּלָ֔יו <WH3627> it and all the instruments וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> thereof both the altar וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כֵּלָ֑יו <WH3627> and all the vessels וַיִּמְשָׁחֵ֖ם <WH4886> thereof and had anointed וַיְקַדֵּ֥שׁ <WH6942> them and sanctified אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וַיַּקְרִ֙יבוּ֙ <WH7126> offered נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <WH5387> That the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel רָאשֵׁ֖י <WH7218> heads בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers הֵ֚ם <WH1992> like נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <WH5387> who [were] the princes הַמַּטֹּ֔ת <WH4294> of the tribes הֵ֥ם <WH1992> like הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> and were over עַל־ <WH5921> were over הַפְּקֻדִֽים׃ <WH6485> them that were numbered

וַיָּבִ֨יאוּ <WH935> And they brought אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנָ֜ם <WH7133> their offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six עֶגְלֹ֥ת <WH5699> wagons צָב֙ <WH6632> covered וּשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> for two עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> and twelve בָּקָ֔ר <WH1241> oxen עֲגָלָ֛ה <WH5699> a wagon עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> for two הַנְּשִׂאִ֖ים <WH5387> of the princes וְשׁ֣וֹר <WH7794> an ox לְאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> and for each one וַיַּקְרִ֥יבוּ <WH7126> and they brought אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> them before הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> the tabernacle
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

קַ֚ח <WH3947> Take מֵֽאִתָּ֔ם <WH853> וְהָי֕וּ <WH1961> become לַעֲבֹ֕ד <WH5647> [it] of them that they may be to do אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> the service אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְנָתַתָּ֤ה <WH5414> and thou shalt give אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> them unto the Levites אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> to every man כְּפִ֥י <WH6310> according עֲבֹדָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5656> to his service

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֲגָלֹ֖ת <WH5699> the wagons וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּקָ֑ר <WH1241> and the oxen וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and gave אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> them unto the Levites

אֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> Two הָעֲגָלֹ֗ת <WH5699> wagons וְאֵת֙ <WH853> אַרְבַּ֣עַת <WH702> and four הַבָּקָ֔ר <WH1241> oxen נָתַ֖ן <WH5414> he gave לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the sons גֵרְשׁ֑וֹן <WH1648> of Gershon כְּפִ֖י <WH6310> according עֲבֹדָתָֽם׃ <WH5656> to their service

וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> And four הָעֲגָלֹ֗ת <WH5699> wagons וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שְׁמֹנַ֣ת <WH8083> and eight הַבָּקָ֔ר <WH1241> oxen נָתַ֖ן <WH5414> he gave לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the sons מְרָרִ֑י <WH4847> of Merari כְּפִי֙ <WH6310> according עֲבֹ֣דָתָ֔ם <WH5656> unto their service בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> under the hand אִֽיתָמָ֔ר <WH385> of Ithamar בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> the priest

וְלִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> But unto the sons קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> of Kohath לֹ֣א <WH3808> none נָתָ֑ן <WH5414> he gave כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because עֲבֹדַ֤ת <WH5656> because the service הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> of the sanctuary עֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH5921> on בַּכָּתֵ֖ף <WH3802> upon their shoulders יִשָּֽׂאוּ׃ <WH5375> belonging unto them [was that] they should bear

וַיַּקְרִ֣יבוּ <WH7126> offered הַנְּשִׂאִ֗ים <WH5387> And the princes אֵ֚ת <WH853> חֲנֻכַּ֣ת <WH2598> for dedicating הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> of the altar בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> in the day הִמָּשַׁ֣ח <WH4886> that it was anointed אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וַיַּקְרִ֧יבוּ <WH7126> offered הַנְּשִׂיאִ֛ם <WH5387> even the princes אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנָ֖ם <WH7133> their offering לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> the altar

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> unto Moses נָשִׂ֨יא <WH5387> prince אֶחָ֜ד <WH259> each לַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> on his day נָשִׂ֤יא <WH5387> leader אֶחָד֙ <WH259> each לַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> day יַקְרִ֙יבוּ֙ <WH7126> They shall offer אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנָ֔ם <WH7133> their offering לַחֲנֻכַּ֖ת <WH2598> for the dedicating הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> of the altar ס

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become הַמַּקְרִ֛יב <WH7126> And he that offered בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <WH7223> the first אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <WH7133> his offering נַחְשׁ֥וֹן <WH5177> was Nahshon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּינָדָ֖ב <WH5992> of Amminadab לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וְקָרְבָּנ֞וֹ <WH7133> And his offering קַֽעֲרַת־ <WH7086> charger כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> silver אַחַ֗ת <WH259> [was] one שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> and thirty וּמֵאָה֮ <WH3967> thereof [was] an hundred מִשְׁקָלָהּ֒ <WH4948> the weight מִזְרָ֤ק <WH4219> bowl אֶחָד֙ <WH259> [shekels] one כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> silver שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> of seventy שֶׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> shekels בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <WH8255> after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary שְׁנֵיהֶ֣ם ׀ <WH8147> both מְלֵאִ֗ים <WH4392> of them [were] full סֹ֛לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour בְּלוּלָ֥ה <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> with oil לְמִנְחָֽה׃ <WH4503> for a meat offering
כַּ֥ף <WH3709> spoon אַחַ֛ת <WH259> One עֲשָׂרָ֥ה <WH6235> of ten זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> [shekels] of gold מְלֵאָ֥ה <WH4392> full קְטֹֽרֶת׃ <WH7004> of incense

פַּ֣ר <WH6499> bullock אֶחָ֞ד <WH259> One בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the first בָּקָ֗ר <WH1241> young אַ֧יִל <WH352> ram אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> one כֶּֽבֶשׂ־ <WH3532> lamb אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> one בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁנָת֖וֹ <WH8141> year לְעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> for a burnt offering
שְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> One לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> for a sin offering

וּלְזֶ֣בַח <WH2077> And for a sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִים֮ <WH8002> of peace offerings בָּקָ֣ר <WH1241> oxen שְׁנַיִם֒ <WH8147> two אֵילִ֤ם <WH352> rams חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <WH2568> five עַתּוּדִ֣ים <WH6260> he goats חֲמִשָּׁ֔ה <WH2568> five כְּבָשִׂ֥ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the first שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year חֲמִשָּׁ֑ה <WH2568> five זֶ֛ה <WH2088> This קָרְבַּ֥ן <WH7133> this [was] the offering נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <WH5177> of Nahshon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <WH5992> of Amminadab פ

בַּיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> On the second הִקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> did offer נְתַנְאֵ֣ל <WH5417> Nethaneel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צוּעָ֑ר <WH6686> of Zuar נְשִׂ֖יא <WH5387> prince יִשָּׂשכָֽר׃ <WH3485> of Issachar

הִקְרִ֨ב <WH7126> He offered אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנ֜וֹ <WH7133> [for] his offering קַֽעֲרַת־ <WH7086> charger כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> silver אַחַ֗ת <WH259> one שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> and thirty וּמֵאָה֮ <WH3967> whereof [was] an hundred מִשְׁקָלָהּ֒ <WH4948> the weight מִזְרָ֤ק <WH4219> bowl אֶחָד֙ <WH259> [shekels] one כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> silver שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> of seventy שֶׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> shekels בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <WH8255> after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary שְׁנֵיהֶ֣ם ׀ <WH8147> both מְלֵאִ֗ים <WH4392> of them full סֹ֛לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour בְּלוּלָ֥ה <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> with oil לְמִנְחָֽה׃ <WH4503> for a meat offering
כַּ֥ף <WH3709> spoon אַחַ֛ת <WH259> One עֲשָׂרָ֥ה <WH6235> of ten זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold מְלֵאָ֥ה <WH4392> [shekels] full קְטֹֽרֶת׃ <WH7004> of incense

פַּ֣ר <WH6499> bullock אֶחָ֞ד <WH259> One בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the first בָּקָ֗ר <WH1241> young אַ֧יִל <WH352> ram אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> one כֶּֽבֶשׂ־ <WH3532> lamb אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> one בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁנָת֖וֹ <WH8141> year לְעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> for a burnt offering
שְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> One לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> for a sin offering

וּלְזֶ֣בַח <WH2077> And for a sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִים֮ <WH8002> of peace offerings בָּקָ֣ר <WH1241> oxen שְׁנַיִם֒ <WH8147> two אֵילִ֤ם <WH352> rams חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <WH2568> five עַתּוּדִ֣ים <WH6260> he goats חֲמִשָּׁ֔ה <WH2568> five כְּבָשִׂ֥ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the first שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year חֲמִשָּׁ֑ה <WH2568> five זֶ֛ה <WH2088> This קָרְבַּ֥ן <WH7133> this [was] the offering נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <WH5417> of Nethaneel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צוּעָֽר׃ <WH6686> of Zuar פ

בַּיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> On the third נָשִׂ֖יא <WH5387> prince לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> the son זְבוּלֻ֑ן <WH2074> of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <WH446> Eliab בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the children חֵלֹֽן׃ <WH2497> of Helon

קָרְבָּנ֞וֹ <WH7133> His offering קַֽעֲרַת־ <WH7086> charger כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> silver אַחַ֗ת <WH259> [was] one שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> and thirty וּמֵאָה֮ <WH3967> whereof [was] an hundred מִשְׁקָלָהּ֒ <WH4948> the weight מִזְרָ֤ק <WH4219> bowl אֶחָד֙ <WH259> [shekels] one כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> silver שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> of seventy שֶׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> shekels בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <WH8255> after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary שְׁנֵיהֶ֣ם ׀ <WH8147> both מְלֵאִ֗ים <WH4392> of them full סֹ֛לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour בְּלוּלָ֥ה <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> with oil לְמִנְחָֽה׃ <WH4503> for a meat offering

בַּיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הָרְבִיעִ֔י <WH7243> On the fourth נָשִׂ֖יא <WH5387> prince לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> the son רְאוּבֵ֑ן <WH7205> of Reuben אֱלִיצ֖וּר <WH468> Elizur בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the children שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <WH7707> of Shedeur

קָרְבָּנ֞וֹ <WH7133> His offering קַֽעֲרַת־ <WH7086> charger כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> silver אַחַ֗ת <WH259> [was] one שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> and thirty וּמֵאָה֮ <WH3967> of an hundred מִשְׁקָלָהּ֒ <WH4948> of the weight מִזְרָ֤ק <WH4219> bowl אֶחָד֙ <WH259> [shekels] one כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> silver שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> of seventy שֶׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> shekels בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <WH8255> after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary שְׁנֵיהֶ֣ם ׀ <WH8147> both מְלֵאִ֗ים <WH4392> of them full סֹ֛לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour בְּלוּלָ֥ה <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> with oil לְמִנְחָֽה׃ <WH4503> for a meat offering
